affiliation_name: Consolidated Western Corporation, which owns Superpumper, Inc. of Scottsdale, Arizona
overview: Paul Morabito is the Chairman of Consolidated Western Corporation, which owns Superpumper, Inc. of Scottsdale, Arizona. From 2005 through 2007, Mr. Morabito was Chairman and CEO Berry-Hinckley Industries, the largest wholesale fuel supplier in Nevada. He served as Senior Policy Advisor to the Los Angeles County Sheriffâ€™s Department from 1998 through 2005; was appointed by the President pro Tempore of the California State Senate to the California High Speed Rail Authority Board (1998-1999) and the California State Coastal Conservancy (2000-2005). California Governor Gray Davis named him Chairman of the State Coastal Conservancy in 2001, a position he served in until 2005.
